channel.title: Random Musings on Dixit Patel
channel.description: Recent content in Random Musings on Dixit Patel

item.title: How do we humans get to understand about hyperspace ?
item.description: If we humans have at-least the perception of the difference between matter and spacetime and even though we are far from being able to explain the workings of it (Gravitons), wouldn’t it also be better if we put efforts in understanding what allows us those perception in the first place ? And then go on to interpolate those to move to higher dimensions ? Other links : Why-does-space-expansion-not-expand-matter? Hidden Dimensions: Exploring Hyperspace
